about_the_game:
(Mathmaria helps you practice addition, subtraction, multiplication and division in a fun way.)

In Mathmaria you play the wizard Abakus, who has the task of freeing the land of Mathmaria from the dark wizard Diskulus, who has stolen the ability of the inhabitants of Mathmaria to use mathematics.



To do this, you explore the world and free the inhabitants and cities from the villain's minions with the power of mathematics!



Help the inhabitants of Mathmaria repair their world by collecting resources and producing materials to carry out the necessary repairs.



I hope you have fun on your journey through Mathmaria.

More about the game:

- Explore the world of Mathmaria and learn addition, subtraction, multiplication and division in the range of 1-100 or choose your

own level of difficulty with the new Advanced Mode (e.g. 100 - 1000 ), which allows you to adapt the game to your own wishes.

- Visit and help the residents of Mathmaria

- Explore the world and find secrets that unlock further mini-games in the game.

- Solve puzzles using mathematics to explore every corner of Mathmaria.

- Invade the temples of mathematics to uncover even the best-kept secrets.
